instructions: Press and hold the POWER button until the power options appear. Tap Power Off and wait until the phone powers down completely. After a few moments of the phone being powered off, hold the POWER button to power the phone back on.

Open the Play Store app. Tap Drawer button In the Installed tab, available updates for installed apps will be displayed. Tap Update all to update all installed apps. To update specific apps individually, tap the app and select Update .
Go to Settings . Tap About > Software updates or Software updates . Tap Check now .

Go to Settings , and then tap Backup & reset . Tap Reset phone or Factory data reset . If you have a security lock on the device, you'll need to enter your security information as well. Tap Reset or OK . The phone will reboot and reset.
